entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or periods of ice pellets beginning early in the morning then changing to periods of rain near noon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle or rain. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of drizzle in the evening and after midnight. A few showers beginning overnight. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
